name: Mike's Mindful Plate
blurb: Food to feel good, at a reasonable price. Help bring intelligently sourced, healthy, and tasty meals served on wheels to NW Arkansas!

name: The Sea Bean Natural Foods Co. - Montauk
blurb: The Sea Bean is a mobile catering food truck that serves only the best seasonal, local, natural and organic foods.

name: The Boulder Food Park: Boulder's Food & Drink Venue
blurb: Local food trucks/carts, local brews, & local music in a beautiful outdoor setting in Boulder. Lets build something Boulderites want!

name: A Place to Call Home - Carabiner Coffee Co.
blurb: After two years of roaming the west Carabiner Coffee and Ol Blue need your help finding a place to set up shop and call it home!

name: Milky Way Shakes
blurb: Help us bring delicious, vegan milkshakes and fries to Austin!  Enjoy our sensational seasonal flavors, the finest in the galaxy.

name: Honoré Farm & Mill • building a mobile mill house
blurb: Help Honoré Farm & Mill build the first-known mobile mill house to craft stone-milled flour that is good for you and the earth.

name: Igloo Rolls Food Truck
blurb: Igloo Rolls brings the Thai Ice Cream presentation combined with epic flavor creations on a mobile food truck to serve Greater Seattle!

name: Dose SLC : Coffee where you need it.
blurb: Dose SLC will be a mobile specialty coffee shop dispensing delicious beverages to residents of and visitors to the Wasatch Front.

name: First Place Coffee
blurb: A community based, quality forward, specialty coffee truck. Brewing Victory in Phoenix, AZ.

name: Help BlackCat Moto Go Mobile
blurb: Full build-out and equipment installation for the CatMobile to become a fully operational coffee truck.

name: Return of Japanese Food Truck
blurb: An Authentic Japanese B-Kyu 'Gurume' Style Street-Food Truck

name: Puttin' On The Mitts: Puddin' and Dessert Truck
blurb: Help us to start the Finger Lake's First and Only Plastic-Free & Sustainable Dessert Food Truck!

name: T-Wraps: Plant-based Food Truck specialised in rollin' Wraps
blurb: Bringing flavourful vegan food to the streets and festivals of Luxembourg and its neighbour countries

name: Cereal Milk Ice Cream
blurb: We're churning that magical milk from the bottom of your cereal bowl into ice cream! And it's incredible! - Coming to RI - Summer 2019!

name: Lager Dog : a Lagers and Hot Dogs pop-up
blurb: A latina owned pop-up that serves only lagers, hot dogs & one delicious flæskestegssandwich.

name: The Books Bourbon & Bacon Bread Truck!
blurb: Moving the Garage Bakery to the Road!

name: The Donut Theory On Wheels
blurb: A mobile gluten free donut shop, vending old fashioned donuts!

name: Honey Bee Waffle Company
blurb: A food trailer that offers fresh waffle creations made with honey!

name: Ironclad Eats
blurb: A badass food truck.

name: Flyin' Taco Food Truck
blurb: In My Home Town Edmonds, WA

name: Blooms End at Neighboring Fields
blurb: The SF Bay Area's cult-favorite traveling bakery is homeward bound.
